Shivah::

"Are you sure that will be a good idea, Commander Killfest?"said 
shiva with a gesture that Darkfate used to do.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest/Scyther::
> 
> Killfest frowns, listening to the conversation.
> 
> "Don't kill the Maximals inside, capture them," he says, amazed at 
what an opportunity the other commanders were missing. He looks at 
Shivah. "Stop the acid. Me and my troops will go retrieve them. Can 
you give me their coordinates?"
> 
> He smiles evilly. "Once we have them, we can easilly use them to 
get what we want from the one outside."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Scyther stands next to Killfest, cloaked from view and scanners.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Shivah:
> > 
> > "WE can use the same defences that the base has " replied 
Shivah"and 
> > we should be sure first where ate them... without be around"
